events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your website, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit properly and I no longer want to keep it.
The customer's request involves refunding a product due to dissatisfaction with fit, categorizing it under refund-related issues.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah at the customer service department to handle the inquiry quickly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I'm here to help you with your refund request and make this process smooth.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
The order number is 4523901, and the jacket was tried on only once indoors. It is in its original condition with all tags attached.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate the refund process immediately once we receive the returned jacket. I'll email you the return shipping label shortly.
That sounds good, thank you! I appreciate the prompt response and help with the return shipping label.
We received the jacket today and have processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund successfully. Feel free to reach out if you need any more assistance.
Since your refund has been processed and the issue was resolved, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support team.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our service considerably.
